languages.text: "Разве? Глейто — мое оружие, а значит, я могу его использовать". {n}Лицо проктора невозмутимо, но голос звучит слегка самодовольно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Глейто — мое оружие, а значит, я могу его использовать". {n}Лицо проктора невозмутимо, но голос звучит слегка самодовольно.{/n}

languages.text: "You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Разве? Глейто — мое оружие, а значит, я могу его использовать". {n}Лицо проктора невозмутимо, но голос звучит слегка самодовольно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is impenetrable, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}
"You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is impenetrable, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}
"You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is impenetrable, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}
"You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}
"You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}

languages.text: 「そう思いますか？グライトは私の武器ですから、使うのは当然です」{n}ソロモーンは無表情だったが、声にはどこか得意げな響きがあった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そう思いますか？グライトは私の武器ですから、使うのは当然です」{n}ソロモーンは無表情だったが、声にはどこか得意げな響きがあった。{/n}

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Glaito benim silahımdır, onu kullanabilirim." {n}Solomorne donuk baksa da sesindeki kendini beğenmişlik kolayca fark ediliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? Glaito benim silahımdır, onu kullanabilirim." {n}Solomorne donuk baksa da sesindeki kendini beğenmişlik kolayca fark ediliyor.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Eso cree? Glaito es mi arma, por lo que tengo derecho a utilizarlo». {n}El rostro de Solomorne se mantiene inexpresivo, pero su voz parece adoptar un tono de satisfacción.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Eso cree? Glaito es mi arma, por lo que tengo derecho a utilizarlo». {n}El rostro de Solomorne se mantiene inexpresivo, pero su voz parece adoptar un tono de satisfacción.{/n}

languages.text: “你这么觉得吗？格雷托是我的武器，也就是说，我可以让它帮忙。”{n}尽管索罗蒙面无表情，但他的声音听起来似乎有些得意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你这么觉得吗？格雷托是我的武器，也就是说，我可以让它帮忙。”{n}尽管索罗蒙面无表情，但他的声音听起来似乎有些得意。{/n}

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas de votre avis. Glaito est mon arme, et en tant que tel, j'ai le droit de m'en servir. » {n}Si l'expression de Solomorne demeure impassible, il s'exprime d'un ton quelque peu suffisant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas de votre avis. Glaito est mon arme, et en tant que tel, j'ai le droit de m'en servir. » {n}Si l'expression de Solomorne demeure impassible, il s'exprime d'un ton quelque peu suffisant.{/n}

languages.text: "Findet Ihr? Glaito ist meine Waffe, das heißt, ich kann ihn benutzen." {n}Solomornes Gesicht ist ausdruckslos, seine Stimme selbstgefällig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think so? Glaito is my weapon, which means I can use him." {n}Solomorne's face is expressionless, but his voice sounds slightly smug.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Findet Ihr? Glaito ist meine Waffe, das heißt, ich kann ihn benutzen." {n}Solomornes Gesicht ist ausdruckslos, seine Stimme selbstgefällig.{/n}
